components:
  schemas:
    BlankEnum:
      enum:
        - ""
    CeleryTask:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          readOnly: true
        task_id:
          type: string
          maxLength: 256
        name:
          type: string
          nullable: true
          maxLength: 256
        dispatch_time:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          nullable: true
        status:
          type: string
          maxLength: 256
        track_reference:
          type: integer
      required:
        - id
        - status
        - task_id
        - track_reference
    File:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          readOnly: true
        import_status:
